divs: sighting detailsapprox. 8:45 p.m. on oct. 22, my husband and i saw a very bright red "glowing" red object in the sky outside of our home. it was moving north to south laterally but making no sound whatsoever. it resembled a chinese lantern but was much larger (like an aircraft) and higher in the sky. unlike a glowing lantern or balloon, this object did not ascend. it moved laterally (south to north). my husband usually has an answer for everything, but not for this. unless it was a blimp flying late at night, we are very perplexed!!! ironically, upon doing a search, there were other similar sightings (the 10\18 munster, in, sighting on your website) and a 10\8 crown point, in sighting found on ufo's northwest.com. we would love to know more about this!
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Crown Point
There were no other sightings in Crown Point on or around October 22nd 2011
